title: SoC SAI 401-0-22 Topics in Sound Production

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is a seminar on sound in Animation. Students will be required to make several short soundtracks for various animated films, that reflects the techniques we are studying.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students should have a good idea of the relationship between sound and image in a variety of animation contexts. They should feel confident in analyzing tracks, lip sync, underscoring, Foley, and the dominant conventions that drive sound in animation.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Materials required will be based on student needs for their soundtrack, but will primarily involve Foley work.
